mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, PRF_ID, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN, AVG_ANA_YN, STDV_ANA_YN, VRN_ANA_YN, AONL_YN, SPAC_ANA_YN, LEN_ANA_YN, CRD_ANA_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID

,NVL(C.MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN, 'N') AS MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN ,NVL(C.AVG_ANA_YN, 'N') AS AVG_ANA_YN ,NVL(C.STDV_ANA_YN, 'N') AS STDV_ANA_YN ,NVL(C.VRN_ANA_YN, 'N') AS VRN_ANA_YN ,NVL(C.AONL_YN, 'N') AS AONL_YN ,NVL(C.SPAC_ANA_YN, 'N') AS SPAC_ANA_YN ,NVL(C.LEN_ANA_YN, 'N') AS LEN_ANA_YN ,NVL(C.CRD_ANA_YN, 'N') AS CRD_ANA_YN ,C.RQST_DCD
, CASE WHEN C.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, C.RVW_STS_CD
,C.RVW_CONTS ,C.VRF_CD ,C.VRF_RMK ,C.OBJ_DESCN ,C.OBJ_VERS ,C.REG_TYP_CD ,C.FRS_RQST_DTM ,C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,C.RQST_DTM ,C.RQST_USER_ID ,C.APRV_DTM ,C.APRV_USER_ID , (CASE WHEN C.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END ) AS FontColor
mapper.insert:
insert into WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN, AVG_ANA_YN, STDV_ANA_YN, VRN_ANA_YN, AONL_YN, SPAC_ANA_YN, LEN_ANA_YN, CRD_ANA_YN, PRF_NM,
PRF_ID,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
(SELECT MAX(RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}) , NVL(#{minMaxValAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), NVL(#{avgAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), NVL(#{stdvAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), NVL(#{vrnAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), NVL(#{aonlYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), NVL(#{spacAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), NVL(#{lenAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), NVL(#{crdAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), #{prfNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA
MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN = NVL(#{minMaxValAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), AVG_ANA_YN = NVL(#{avgAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), STDV_ANA_YN = NVL(#{stdvAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), VRN_ANA_YN = NVL(#{vrnAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), AONL_YN = NVL(#{aonlYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), SPAC_ANA_YN = NVL(#{spacAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), LEN_ANA_YN = NVL(#{lenAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), CRD_ANA_YN = NVL(#{crdAnaYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N'), PRF_NM = #{prfNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRF_ID = #{prfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS ( BIZ_DTL_CD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , VRF_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_DTL_CD , VRF_DTLS ) SELECT #{bizDtlCd} AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,NVL(C.VRF_SNO,0) + 1 AS VRF_SNO ,0 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,#{vrfDtlCd} AS VRF_DTL_CD ,NULL AS VRF_DTLS FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR RM INNER JOIN WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA A ON RM.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND RM.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DQI DQI ON DQI.DQI_ID = RM.DQI_ID AND DQI.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(VRF_SNO) AS VRF_SNO ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE A.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY RQST_NO, RQST_SNO) C ON RM.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND RM.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE RM.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} --검증쿼리 AND RM.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAM_PRF_COL_ANA C ON M.PRF_ID = C.PRF_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DQI ON DQI.DQI_ID = M.DQI_ID AND DQI.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE RM.PRF_ID = M.PRF_ID AND RM.PRF_KND_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND NVL(A.MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN,'_') = NVL(C.MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN,'_') AND NVL(A.AVG_ANA_YN,'_') = NVL(C.AVG_ANA_YN,'_') AND NVL(A.STDV_ANA_YN,'_') = NVL(C.STDV_ANA_YN,'_') AND NVL(A.VRN_ANA_YN,'_') = NVL(C.VRN_ANA_YN,'_') AND NVL(A.AONL_YN,'_') = NVL(C.AONL_YN,'_') AND NVL(A.SPAC_ANA_YN,'_') = NVL(C.SPAC_ANA_YN,'_') AND NVL(A.LEN_ANA_YN,'_') = NVL(C.LEN_ANA_YN,'_') AND NVL(A.CRD_ANA_YN,'_') = NVL(C.CRD_ANA_YN,'_') AND NVL(RM.ADT_CND_SQL,'_') = NVL(M.ADT_CND_SQL,'_') AND M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND NVL(A.MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN,'N') = 'N' AND NVL(A.AVG_ANA_YN,'N') = 'N' AND NVL(A.STDV_ANA_YN,'N') = 'N' AND NVL(A.VRN_ANA_YN,'N') = 'N' AND NVL(A.AONL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND NVL(A.SPAC_ANA_YN,'N') = 'N' AND NVL(A.LEN_ANA_YN,'N') = 'N' AND NVL(A.CRD_ANA_YN,'N') = 'N'
mapper.select:
SELECT
, (CASE WHEN M.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END ) AS FontColor FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA C ON M.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND M.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY M.RQST_SNO
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_PRF_COL_ANA A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA B ON M.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND B.VRF_CD = '1' WHERE M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND M.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND M.VRF_CD = '1' AND M.PRF_ID = A.PRF_ID )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_PRF_COL_ANA SELECT
, PAT_ANA_YN FROM WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA B ON M.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND B.VRF_CD = '1' WHERE M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND M.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND M.VRF_CD = '1' AND M.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO ) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_PRF_COL_ANA A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA B ON M.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND B.VRF_CD = '1' WHERE M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND M.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND M.VRF_CD = '1' AND M.PRF_ID = A.PRF_ID ) AND A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_PRF_COL_ANA (
,EXP_DTM ,STR_DTM ) SELECT
, TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , SYSDATE AS STR_DTM FROM WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA B ON M.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND B.VRF_CD = '1' WHERE M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND M.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND M.VRF_CD = '1' AND M.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM ,B.DB_SCH_ID ,B.DB_SCH_LNM ,B.DB_SCH_PNM ,D.DBC_TBL_NM ,D.DBC_COL_NM AS OBJ_NM ,'I' AS IBS_STATUS
,'Y' AS CRD_ANA_YN
,'Y' AS MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN
,'Y' AS AONL_YN
,'Y' AS LEN_ANA_YN
,'CU' AS RQST_DCD
,#{adtCndSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS ADT_CND_SQL
FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_TBL C ON B.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_COL D ON B.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID
AND C.DBC_TBL_NM = D.DBC_TBL_NM
AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = #{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND B.DB_SCH_PNM = #{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND D.DBC_TBL_NM = #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (D.DBC_COL_NM LIKE REPLACE(#{objNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '*', '%') OR D.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE REPLACE(#{objNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '*', '%') )
ORDER BY A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, B.DB_SCH_ID

SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.PRF_ID, A.PRF_NM, A.RQST_DCD
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN, A.AVG_ANA_YN, A.STDV_ANA_YN, A.VRN_ANA_YN , A.AONL_YN, A.SPAC_ANA_YN, A.LEN_ANA_YN, A.CRD_ANA_YN , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , (CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END ) AS FontColor FROM WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA A
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA ( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , PRF_ID , PRF_NM , RQST_DCD , RVW_STS_CD , RVW_CONTS , VRF_CD , VRF_RMK , MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN , AVG_ANA_YN , STDV_ANA_YN , VRN_ANA_YN , AONL_YN , SPAC_ANA_YN , LEN_ANA_YN , CRD_ANA_YN , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID , PAT_ANA_YN ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , RQST_SNO , PRF_ID , PRF_NM , RQST_DCD , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , MIN_MAX_VAL_ANA_YN , AVG_ANA_YN , STDV_ANA_YN , VRN_ANA_YN , AONL_YN , SPAC_ANA_YN , LEN_ANA_YN , CRD_ANA_YN , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , NULL , NULL , PAT_ANA_YN FROM WAQ_PRF_COL_ANA WHERE RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RVW_STS_CD = '2'
